decks.notes: This deck focuses on quickly putting pressure on the opponent by playing aggressive creatures and burn spells. Norin, Swift Survivalist serves as the commander, creating constant triggers that can chip away at the opponent's life total. The deck is filled with efficient creatures like Monastery Swiftspear, Goblin Guide, and Bonecrusher Giant, along with powerful burn spells such as Lightning Bolt, Fireblast, and Searing Spear. The goal is to maintain a fast pace and keep the opponent on the defensive, racing to reduce their life total to zero before they can stabilize. By consistently applying pressure and using direct damage spells to finish off the opponent, this deck aims to secure quick victories in one-on-one matches.

This deck focuses on utilizing aggressive creatures and efficient removal spells to control the battlefield while pressuring the opponent. The commander, Aragorn, King of Gondor, provides a powerful anthem effect to buff your creatures and increase their effectiveness in combat. The deck also includes a mix of powerful planeswalkers and versatile counter spells to help disrupt the opponent's game plan and protect your own creatures. With a strong mana base and a variety of card draw options, this deck is designed to maintain a consistent stream of threats while keeping the opponent on the back foot. Ultimately, the goal is to overwhelm the opponent with a combination of strong creatures and disruptive spells to secure victory.

The main focus of this deck is to control the game by utilizing various spells, creatures, and graveyard mechanics to disrupt and manipulate the opponent's strategy. Aminatou, the Fateshifter serves as the commander, providing additional utility and card advantage. The deck includes a range of removal spells like Swords to Plowshares and Fatal Push, as well as counterspells such as Force of Will and Mana Tithe to deal with threats. Additionally, it makes use of reanimation spells like Reanimate and Unburial Rites to bring back powerful creatures from the graveyard. The deck also includes card draw and card selection spells to ensure consistency and flexibility in gameplay.

This deck revolves around utilizing Sheoldred, the Apocalypse as a powerful aggro commander to control the battlefield and outvalue opponents. The deck focuses on disruption and removal spells to clear the way for Sheoldred to dominate the board. It includes a mix of hand disruption, creature removal, and graveyard recursion to maintain pressure on opponents and keep them on the back foot. The deck also features a strong mana base with Cabal Coffers and Urborg, Tomb of Yawgmoth to ramp up and cast powerful spells like Emrakul, the Promised End and Necrodominance. Overall, the key concept of this deck is to overwhelm opponents with aggressive threats and disruption while maintaining control of the game.

The main focus of this deck is to quickly and aggressively control the game using a combination of efficient removal spells, disruptive creatures, and powerful sorceries. Sorin of House Markov serves as the commander, providing a strong and versatile threat on the battlefield. The inclusion of Lurrus of the Dream-Den as a companion allows for additional value by casting low-cost permanents from the graveyard. With a mix of disruptive cards like Thoughtseize and Hymn to Tourach, along with powerful removal like Swords to Plowshares and Fatal Push, this deck aims to disrupt the opponent's game plan while building a strong board presence. Additionally, the deck includes various reanimation spells and recursion effects to maintain a steady stream of threats.
